articles.title: Crypto firm Circle has $3.3B exposure to Silicon Valley Bank - Fox Business
articles.description: The cryptocurrency firm Circle says that $3.3 billion of its $40 billion USD Coin reserves are held by Silicon Valley Bank, a lender that was shutdown on Friday.
articles.content:
Exposure in the collapse of lender Silicon Valley Bank is starting to be reported in the financial industry.
